stepTwo.whyCanal:
We need a new Password for your Mattermost account. Watch out! 
The Password must contain at least 1 lowercase alphabetical character, 1 uppercase alphabetical character, 1 numeric character, one special character (! @ # $ % ^ &) and must be ten characters or longer!
